ColorCodes.py – A multicolored log4j tailer¶

Platforms: Unix, Linux

Module author: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

Colorcodes class¶

class ColorCodes.Colorcodes¶

Defines the ANSI Terminal color codes

getCode(color)¶
Returns the ANSI Terminal color code associated with the ascii color word passed as a parameter
